meanings: [명사] request, (formal) entreaty, [동사] request, ask (sb to do), (formal) entreat
ask to take care of one´s future affairs

vlive.korean: [칭찬이 아니라] 왜 당부를 하고 있어요? [Not a compliment] Why are you giving a request? 듣기 View video MOMO X : [모모문고] UNB 의진 편
vlive.english: [Not a compliment] Why are you giving a request?

vlive.korean: [당부의 말 남기고 퇴근] 이제 저는 퇴근해보도록 하겠습니다. [Going home after words of caution] I'm going home now. 듣기 View video YUN SI YUN : [DIARY CAM 3] 윤시윤 l YG보석함
vlive.english: [Going home after words of caution] I'm going home now.

vlive.korean: 이건 저희 staff 분들께 당부 드리는 겁니다. I'm just talking to my staffs. 듣기 View video LEE HI : HI TV - Episode 02
vlive.english: I'm just talking to my staffs.

vlive.korean: '조심하세요'라는 당부의 말씀을 주셨어요. They are telling you to be careful. 듣기 View video V MOVIE : <현빈> 배우를 만나다 LIVE 'Getting Personal With '
vlive.english: They are telling you to be careful.

vlive.korean: 그 얘기 하지 말라고 당부 받고 무대 올라왔잖아요. We've been told not to talk about it. 듣기 View video V MUSIC : [REPLAY] 이승철 데뷔 30주년 기념 절친 LIVE
vlive.english: We've been told not to talk about it.

examples.korean: I must ask you not to do that again. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 당신에게 다시는 그러지 말라고 당부해야겠군요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I must ask you not to do that again. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I beg you, from the bottom of my heart, to spare his life. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그의 목숨을 구해 주시길 간절히 당부드립니다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I beg you, from the bottom of my heart, to spare his life. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The cashiers were asked to watch out for forged banknotes. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 출납 직원들은 위조지폐에 주의하라는 당부를 들었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The cashiers were asked to watch out for forged banknotes. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I ask that you first check with the legal department before agreeing to make changes in the contract. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 계약서 변경에 동의하기 전에 먼저 법무팀과 상담해 보시기를 당부드립니다. DARAKWON
examples.english: I ask that you first check with the legal department before agreeing to make changes in the contract. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Our managing director is asking everyone in the overseas offices to refrain from discussing the merger with anyone outside the company. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 당사 전무이사께서 어떤 외부인과도 이번 합병을 논의하지 말라고 해외지사의 모든 직원에게 당부하고 계십니다. DARAKWON
examples.english: Our managing director is asking everyone in the overseas offices to refrain from discussing the merger with anyone outside the company. Add to Wordbook
